import React from 'react' //import link functionality import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; const Home = () => { const posts = [ { id: 1, title: "Messi still being the GOAT", desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. {posts.map(post=>(

{post.title}

))}
); } export default Home
